scripts.docker:start:linux: systemctl --user start docker || sudo systemctl start docker
scripts.bootstrap: pnpm install && pnpm build:packages && docker compose up -d db && sleep 5 && docker compose run --rm api python manage.py migrate && docker compose run --rm api python manage.py seed_dev_data
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose run --rm api python manage.py migrate
scripts.db:makemigrations: docker compose run --rm api python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d sga_time_tracking
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db && sleep 5 && docker compose run --rm api python manage.py migrate
scripts.api:shell: docker compose exec api python manage.py shell
scripts.api:createsuperuser: docker compose exec api python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.api:create-admin: docker compose exec api python manage.py create_admin_user
scripts.api:seed-dev: docker compose exec api python manage.py seed_dev_data
